p: The Asian origin of DENVs is supported by both ecological and phylogenetic evidence ( Vasilakis et al., 2008) Thus all four dengue serotypes have been documented in a sylvatic cycle involving nonhuman primates and arboreal mosquitoes in the Malay Peninsula ( Marchette et al., 1978), whereas only DENV-2 has been documented in a similar cycle in Africa ( Robert et al., 1993).
